The description of the Data Analyst role at 2U could be improved by quantifying the scale of the projects and the number of users impacted by the analysis. Details on the dataset sizes and complexities should be included.

The skills section is good, but could be improved by adding more specific tools and technologies, and clarifying the level of proficiency for each skill (e.g., 'Expert in Python', 'Proficient in SQL').
